title: Center for the Scientific Study of Prejudice Fund
description: To broadly support the education and research of graduate students examining Center-related topics, including travel and stipends. The funds will also be used to secure speakers to the CU Center for Scientific Study of Prejudice.
marketingContent: To broadly support the education and research of graduate students examining Center-related topics. The funds will also be used to secure speakers to the CU Center for Scientific Study of Prejudice.
